title: The Fiend
content: ve spells and a health-restoring feature upon defeating enemies, aiding in your character's survival. Dark One's Blessing, automatically earned at level 1, allows The Fiend to receive your Charisma modifier + Level in the form of hit points. This extends survivability for the Warlock. Note that it only counts if you are the source that kills the target. At level 6, The Fiend earns Dark One's Own Luck which may add a 1d10 to an Ability Check. At level 10, The Fiend earns Fiendish Resilience. This
